message.body: I got a kitten!!!
Whaaaat?
How are you gonna keep it in that house?
Lol what kind of question is that?
But for now he/she is in the back bedroom until he/she is fully acquainted with us. Then afterwards meet shadow but for now its in the back room getting a feel for the house
I don't think shadow can be near a cat
Where'd you get it?
Lol eventually he'll be ok... but we have nice so hopefully this kitten becomes a lean mean mouse hunting machine!
And from someone steph knows. Mother abandoned the two kittens and lady took them in until she found homes for them.
Okay. Do you have a picture?

Not yer plus need to clean her first. Long story short, lady was an idiot and when giving her to us the cat got lose in her basement with all the first and dust. White kitty is now grey/brown kitty lol.
So will take a picture when she is all fresh and clean
She's cute. I want to see her in person. Are you gonna get her fixed?
Probably... are you doing anything this sat?
I'm going to be but probably not all day why
Im painting my room sat morning and Stroh has work so if you want to come and help me.
Im going to set a vet appt for early sat and then I have to shower by 430-5 bec I have plans. So ill need to paint in between both those
Okay. Me and my friends are going to Linvilla Orchards but I don't know when yet. I'll help as much as I can before I have to leave.
What color are you painting it?

Im thinking an almond color... we painted it once already. Three walls white asparagus and my closet walls mushroom. Stein picked those colors and now I don't like. Mainly bec the white asparagus is too pale. I need a more identifying color
So almond and maybe keep the mushroom color. But idk yet
Okay
So it needs one layer?
Yea. Im just changing paint color.
Okay
